Class LoggerConfig.RootLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.AbstractLifeCycle

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filterable, LifeCycle, LifeCycle2
    Enclosing class:
    LoggerConfig

    @Plugin(name="root",
        category="Core",
        printObject=true)
public static class LoggerConfig.RootLogger
extends LoggerConfig
    The root Logger.
